keyFacts: The document is a set of prison log sheets from the MCC New York Special Housing Unit dated August 9, 2019.
It details a 30-minute observational check procedure for inmates in continuous locked-down status (administrative detention or disciplinary segregation).
The procedure requires staff to observe inmates at least twice per hour on an irregular schedule, with all observations documented.
The sheets are for multiple tiers (L, M, ZA J, ZA K, ZA G, ZA H, ZB), suggesting a large or multi-unit SHU operation.
Each sheet is reviewed and signed by a Morning Watch Lieutenant and a Captain, indicating a chain of custody and oversight for inmate monitoring.
